Homepage.Welcome1: Alone we can do so little, together we can do
Homepage.Volunteertext: Become part of our community and earn that RING

aboutUs.coffee: Engineers: they turn coffee into buildings.
aboutUs.missionStatement: SITE BACHELORS is a student association from the STEM students to the STEM students with one goal in mind: Providing Engineers with the coffee they need.
aboutUs.driveStatement1: If being full-time students during the summer taught us something, it is that Engineers struggle to find food in this period.
aboutUs.driveStatement2: During the Fall and Winter period, SITE would be an engineer hotspot, however, durin Summer, one can appreciate a decrease in the engineers demographics in buildings such as SITE and STEM.
aboutUs.driveStatement3: While STEM is pretty much a food-free zone, SITE possesses a Tim Hortons as well as a food store that keep us well fed during classes. However, during Winter we find ourselves deprived from these food sources, which forces us to recurr to FSS buildings, thus, abandoning our roots and commuting more, not to mention that everythng closes at 3pm and we have classes later on.

Testimonies: What our donors and volunteers say about us

BACHELORS.ParagraphText: Explore our options and go on the perfect date

Donations.altHappy: CLICK TO PLAY: STEM students having fun and cheering in celebration
Donations.Description1: The DONATE PROGRAM is an initiative where the most eligible graduates from the SITE volunteer to have a date with other engineering students after making a significant donation.
Donations.Description2: The funds raised are used to finance alternative food services for SITE Engineering students, thus alleviating their situation and giving them better opportunities and a better future.
Donations.Stat1description: fail their courses due to an inadequate diet
Donations.Stat2description: of productivity due to a lack of coffee
Donations.Stat3description: The more time students spend at an FSS building, the less likely they are to graduate
Donations.ButtonLabel: Button to be redirected to the DONATE page

Donate.fineprint: *The datails of the meeting will be arranged  1-2 business days following the donation via email

faqItem1Title: How many donations can I make?
faqItem1Content: As many as you would like
faqItem2Title: What is included in the date package?
faqItem2Content: A meeting with and engineering student
faqItem3Title: How do I become a volunteer?
faqItem3Content: Please send us an email at sitebachelorsgmail.com
faqItem4Content: You enter a tentative date and time during the donation process and we will do our best to accomodate you accordingly. We will send you an email once we schedule your date to confirm the offical time and date
faqItem5Title: Can I donate and not go on a date?
faqItem5Content: Sure, the DONATE PROGRAM is optional. We appreciate your collaboration
Terms: SITE BACHELORS is not responsible for the Bachelors cancelling the dates, they may do so at any time if they feel uncomfortable. Some of the bachelors may not actually be bachelors. The data presented is an extract from SITE students and may not actually be representative of the studentsâ€™ circumstances. SITE Bachelors is not liable for going on a bad date, we do our best to provide students with a safe and comfortable environment and aim to increase food sources for SEG students on campus.
